pages.title: Decaying King
pages.text: Level: <level_t4>$(br2)Spawns in $(copy:Decaying Kingdom)Decaying Kingdom$()[$(copy:soulsweapons:decaying_kingdom)soulsweapons:decaying_kingdom$()].$(br)Locate this structure in the $(bold)Nether$() with $(key)Moonstone Compass$() or $(mage/spell#locate)Spell Locate$().$(br2)Alternatively, use a $(key)Withered Demon Heart$() on a $(key)Blackstone Pedestal$() to summon.

$(br)Defeating $(key)Decaying King$() drops $(key)Accursed Blackstone$(), which can be used to craft $(boss/t3/blackstone_golem)Chiseled Blackstone Holders$() or the $(mechanic/loot_charm)Unpolished Looting Charm$().
